org.apache.james.transport.remotedeliverytester
Class ProcMail

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.james.transport.remotedeliverytester.ProcMail

public class ProcMail
extends java.lang.Object

This class records the status of a delivery This is used by the remote delivery tester to assert events for a given delivery
